channel.title: [317] DeathSlay Team Needed
channel.description:
[img]http://i36.servimg.com/u/f36/15/36/13/25/11_dea12.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/4tm2s8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/20a55hf.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]Hell, I Have Been Coding DeathSlay For A While Now And I Need Some Help With It. I Have Closed DeathSlay So I Can Finish Some Of My Coding.
Since I Have Closed Down DeathSlay To Code, I Have Done...
New Loading Bar On Client. New BackRound On Client. New Color Yells On Client. Edited The Client.java In The Client. Chose A New Home. Edited Quest Tab A Little. Making/editing The Objects In Dungon Work. (Not All Finished Yet)
[u]What I Will Be Needing To Do/Add Is..[/u]
Pk Box New Shops Pk Shop SkillerZone Server Bot Full RuneCrafting (all works just need to add So U Can Tele To The Alters, And New Rewards) Make The Gates (currently heads) Regular Gates Team Development
Coder - Open Coder - Open Coder - Open GFX Designer - Open I May Need A Hoster My Laptop Laggs The Server :/
[u]Are Rewards[/u]
Coder - Coder Rank, All Owner Commands, Custom Bank
GFX Designer - Admin, GFX Designer Rank
Please Full This Out If You Would Like To Join DeathSlay's Staff :) [/size] [code]Name: Age: Position Wanted: Experience in Position Wanted: A Way To Contact You:[/code]
Add My Msn If You Are Interested Mccullom99@yahoo.com
Here Are Some Pictures :)
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/5vtx8n.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2re5nrm.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/2uy6gx2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/1045mv5.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/m93jia.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/ct75l.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt]Please Post A Reply If You Would Like To Join.
From,
~Death~[/size]
[IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/v6rdqt.png[/img]
